CustomField.description: Populate if the benefits delivered through Program Engagement accrue to the members of the Contact's Household Account, for example, a Program Engagement with a Food Bank. If the benefit accrues only to the individual Contact, leave the field blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populate if the benefits delivered through Program Engagement accrue to the members of the Contact's Household Account, for example, a Program Engagement with a Food Bank. If the benefit accrues only to the individual Contact, leave the field blank.
CustomField.label: Household Account
